## SummonerSpell class

A representation of an in-game summoner spell.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SummonerSpell 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, data)](./shieldbow.summonerspell._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>SummonerSpell</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cooldown](./shieldbow.summonerspell.cooldown.md) |  | number | The cooldown of this summoner spell (in seconds) |
|  [description](./shieldbow.summonerspell.description.md) |  | string | The description of this summoner spell. |
|  [id](./shieldbow.summonerspell.id.md) |  | string | The ID of this summoner spell. |
|  [image](./shieldbow.summonerspell.image.md) |  | string | A link to the image that represents this summoner spell. |
|  [key](./shieldbow.summonerspell.key.md) |  | number | The numerical ID of this summoner spell. |
|  [maxAmmo](./shieldbow.summonerspell.maxammo.md) |  | number | Number of times you can use this spell before it goes on a cooldown. |
|  [modes](./shieldbow.summonerspell.modes.md) |  | [GameMode](./shieldbow.gamemode.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The game modes you can pick this summoner spell in. |
|  [name](./shieldbow.summonerspell.name.md) |  | string | The name of this summoner spell. |
|  [range](./shieldbow.summonerspell.range.md) |  | number | The range of this spell, i.e. how many units far away can you cast this from. |
|  [rawTooltip](./shieldbow.summonerspell.rawtooltip.md) |  | string | The raw tooltip of this summoner spell. This contains some HTML-like tags to help view this better on webpages.<!-- -->Even though, these are supposed to be more detailed than the [SummonerSpell.description](./shieldbow.summonerspell.description.md)<!-- -->. It is not recommended using either this OR [SummonerSpell.tooltip](./shieldbow.summonerspell.tooltip.md)<!-- -->. This is because they contain placeholders without values to fill them with. Use [SummonerSpell.description](./shieldbow.summonerspell.description.md) instead.<!-- -->See [tooltip](./shieldbow.summonerspell.tooltip.md) to view this with the HTML-like tags stripped out. |
|  [summonerLevel](./shieldbow.summonerspell.summonerlevel.md) |  | number | The level of this summoner spell. This is the summoner level at which you unlock this spell. |
|  [tooltip](./shieldbow.summonerspell.tooltip.md) |  | string | The tooltip of this summoner spell. This does not contain the HTML-like tags to help view this better on console and other output media.<!-- -->See [rawTooltip](./shieldbow.summonerspell.rawtooltip.md) to view this with the HTML-like tags included. |
